welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brentford, UK! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of this historic city known for its stunning riverside views and bustling markets. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Brentford has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The busiest terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly long-haul and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The terminal for SkyTeam airlines and some other international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow, serving mostly British Airways flights.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then requires payment

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private jet passengers, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
